<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>checkManualOption</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var grTrade = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_mss_c_proc_mss_custody_trade');
if (grTrade.get('000014301bf44e106ed00e1ad34bcb04')) {
    var market = grTrade.owning_business.toString(); //owning business
    var cseType = grTrade.getValue('case_type'); // Trade Case Type
    var trdLifeCycle = grTrade.getValue('trade_lifecycle_status'); // Trade Life Cycyle Status
    var trdSource = grTrade.getValue('source_system'); // Trade Source System
    var bpiStage = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_hsbc_mss_o_business_process_stage'); //evaluate if any of the value in BPI table is valid for the respective market
    bpiStage.addEncodedQuery('business_process.sys_id=' + gs.getProperty('x_hsb11_mss_custod.mss.custody.event.businessprocess.core') + '^ctac_code=' + trdLifeCycle + '^market=' + market); //Evaluating the Business Process Stage table for any value true in the array declared below
    bpiStage.query();
    if (bpiStage.next()) {
        gs.debug(bpiStage.sys_id);
        var trdChk = ['confirm_trade', 'put_trade_on_hold', 'resume_trade', 'settle_trade, process_trade_cancellation', 'trade_amend'];
        var flag = false;
        for (var i = 0; i < trdChk.length; i++) {
            gs.info("man Option" + bpiStage.getValue(trdChk[i]));
            if (bpiStage.getValue(trdChk[i]) == true) {
                flag = true;
                break; //exit loop if any of the value returns true from BPI table
            } else
                flag = false;
        }
        if (flag) { //return true if anyone value of the array in business process stage table is declared as true
            if ((cseType == 'no_open_case') && (trdLifeCycle != 'TradCanc') && (trdLifeCycle != 'TradSttld') && (trdSource == 'GHSS') && (gs.hasRole('x_hsb11_mss_custod.custody_maker'))) {
                gs.info("Hello 1 " + true); //if there are no active cases,trade Life cycle is not Trade Settled or trade Cancelled,the Source system is GHSS and the logged in user holds Custody maker role
            } else
                gs.info("Hello 2 " + false);
        } else
            gs.info("Hello 3 " + false); //return false if every value of the array in business process stage table is declared as false
    } else
        gs.info("Hello 4 " + false); // if no records found in BPI table
}]]></script>
